casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Linwood Earl FORTE. No. 20A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Thomas K. Maher, Chapel Hill, for Forte. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

*854The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 3rd day of October 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
